paragraphs.body: Hmm, I'm not liking this new system. I don't find it easier, and I think trying to standardize each user's respective message will just result in fail. I prefer what we had before. Joey aa 03:20, 25 July 2009 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: Yes, but I think I understand what 888 was trying to do,here. This place was a big mess, no doubt. It was difficult to tell apart one from another, and for new users or inactive admins it would be tough to read it or edit it.--Avatar Talk 03:22, 25 July 2009 (UTC)
